title: Kodak Ad font?
content:
Does anyone recognize the attached font? It’s from a Kodak ad. My Font, What The Font, suggested it was Progress Light [http://new.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/case/200430/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013180323/http:/new.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/case/200430/ "http://new.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/case/200430/") but some letters do not match, like the “A”, “O”, “D”.

author: mpantell
